abstract_summ: Among 11 patients in Thailand infected with severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2, we detected viral RNA in upper respiratory specimens a median of 14 days after illness onset and 9 days after fever resolution.The other patient had rapid symptom cessation but persistent viral RNA detection.One patient had persistent, low-grade upper respiratory tract symptoms without fever.The coronavirus diseases in children are usually mild and epidemiological exposure is a key clue to recognize pediatric case.We describe 2 cases of coronavirus disease in patients with mild upper respiratory symptoms.
title_summ: Clinical and Epidemiological Features of a Family Cluster of Symptomatic and Asymptomatic Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 InfectionLow Transmission Risk of 9 Asymptomatic Carriers Tested Positive for both SARS-CoV-2 Nucleic Acid and Serum IgGClinical Characteristics of Patients Hospitalized with Coronavirus Disease, ThailandA Case Series of children with 2019 novel coronavirus infection: clinical and epidemiological featuresCOVID-19 in 2 Persons with Mild Upper Respiratory Tract Symptoms on a Cruise Ship, Japan
title_abstract_phrases: Clinical Characteristics of Patients Hospitalized with Coronavirus Disease, ThailandAmong 11 patients in Thailand infected with severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2, we detected viral RNA in upper respiratory specimens a median of 14 days after illness onset and 9 days after fever resolution.COVID-19 in 2 Persons with Mild Upper Respiratory Tract Symptoms on a Cruise Ship, JapanWe describe 2 cases of coronavirus disease in patients with mild upper respiratory symptoms.The other patient had rapid symptom cessation but persistent viral RNA detection.One patient had persistent, low-grade upper respiratory tract symptoms without fever.Clinical and Epidemiological Features of a Family Cluster of Symptomatic and Asymptomatic Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 InfectionIn a family experiencing coronavirus disease 2019, the parents and 2 children aged 2 and 5 years became infected but the youngest child was not infected.
